title: Biochemistry Lab II
description: Laboratory techniques in the isolation and characterization of biological molecules with special emphasis on modern techniques.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: (CHEM 4512 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or CHEM 3522 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D) and CHEM 4581 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
